front.title: GOST Cipher Suites for Transport Layer Security (TLS) Protocol Version 1.2

abstract.t: This document specifies three new cipher suites for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol Version 1.2 to support the Russian cryptographic standard algorithms (called GOST algorithms).
This specification is developed to facilitate implementations that wish to support the GOST algorithms. This document does not imply IETF endorsement of the cipher suites.
